backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining competition, results, payments, authorization, and state management with custom sorting utilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry root mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Utility to normalize backend error messages into user-facing text.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query cache key definitions including per-event keys.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setting up routing, query client, dark theme, and profile setup gating.
Component restricting access to allowlisted admins with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with handling for stale sessions.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard showing login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: UI card showing competition metadata, status, and navigation link.
Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and a special simplified layout for solve flow routes.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table with ranks, Ao5 computation, attempt details, and user display names.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows the user's profile info and supports inline editing and saving of the display name.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A modal dialog for first‑time users to set email and display name, creating their profile.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements the inspection countdown logic with penalties and reveals scramble during the inspection phase.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a completion message after all solves and provides navigation to leaderboard or competition page.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: A solve timer that starts/stops timing solves and reports the elapsed time on completion.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Contains Razorpay test-mode configuration settings for payments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload handler to warn users before leaving the page when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the currently authenticated user's profile using the actor, gated on actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity management.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, user profiles, competitions, results, and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining global CSS variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Calculates average of five (Ao5) times with DNF rules and defines leaderboard entry types.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human‑readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay script and opens the payment checkout with configured options.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into seconds.milliseconds or DNF.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides an admin form to create a competition with events, scrambles, fees, and metadata, then submits via API.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting a competition.
Fetches competitions, groups them by status, and displays them using CompetitionCard components with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Loads a competition and its leaderboard for a specific event and displays results or a no-results message.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the user solve flow including inspection, solving, submission, and attempt progression for a competition event.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, the list of all events, and the default event constant.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for navigation state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, containers, and loading plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current architecture, features, issues, and requirements for an online speedcubing platform, including tech stack, admin rules, multi‑event support, and known competition‑creation error.
